game.name: Rebel Attack Shooter
game.description:
Oh my god! Your city is under the biggest terrorist attack of the history. Being the bravest warrior of your country, the authorities have chosen you to handle this mission. Will you be able to deal with this challenging task on your own? If yes, join Rebel Attack Shooter and be ready to battle against the number of waves of armed enemies. The best part is that the successfully completion of each mission will reward you with a significant amount of money. 
Use that money to unlock new weapons and enter the battlefield with more power and confidence in this brand new action game! Choose any weapon out of multiple options M1911, M4, AK47 and Sniper and get ready to enter the fiercely battle field! Initially, you will be given M1911 to finish your enemies. However, after completing level, you will earn some money through which you can upgrade other powerful weapons in this one of the best shooting games for boys. 
Once you are done with the weapon selection, click the next button to choose your level. Start with the first level and clear it to move to the next one. When you enter the game, you will see that the armed enemies will keep coming to you time to time. Shoot them before they attack at you in this spectacular city shootout! Take down all your targets with the help of multiple weapons ranging from handguns to sniper rifles in this 3D shooter! Check out more thrilling and engaging action based titles for free on atmegame.com without download!

game.webControlKeys: W,A,S,D ALL ARROWS TO MOVE, LEFT CLICK-HIT ,RIGHT CLICK-FROUNT VIEW,R-RELOAD,MOUSE WHEEL TO TOGGLE BETWEEN TORCH AND GUN,L- TO ON OFF TORCH
